title: How can bodily awareness and stilling internal dialogue improve mental and physical well-being?
first_phrase: In the previous paragraphs, the author highlights the importance of being aware of one's physical reactions and mental responses. The excessive inner dialogues that we have often prevent us from being free and living better. The author suggests that direct sensory perception exercises can help us free ourselves from psychosomatic reactions and reduce useless thoughts. In the concluding 200 tokens, the author emphasizes the effectiveness of stilling our inner dialogue and establishing contact with a more comprehensive inner dimension. By doing so, we can conquer negative beliefs and restricting thoughts. This text provides insightful methods to improve one's mental and physical well-being.
content: The disappearance of one’s limiting inner dialogue The mind’s useless self-talk is one of the main forms of energy dispersion. These internal dialogues are often mere instances of internalization of commands and words that have been heard in one’s young age or from other persons: “Take care to …”, “do not do …”, etc. So long as our mind is replete with these inward dialogues, we will never be able to be free. No doubt the eradication of all useless thoughts is not easy to accomplish, but it is at least easy to reduce them by no more than 10%, as that alone will cause you to live better. The exercises based on bodily awareness guide our attention to a dimension of ourselves which is more directly sensory and more far-reaching in its effectiveness. As for stilling our internal dialogue, it helps us conquer the castle of words which erect our negative beliefs, our restricting thoughts. Bit by bit, we will understand that they are no more than automatic reflexes and words, and we will establish contact with a more comprehensive inner dimension.
last_phrase: In conclusion, by reducing our limiting inner dialogue through exercises based on bodily awareness and stilling our internal dialogue, we can conquer the castle of words that creates negative beliefs and restricting thoughts, and establish contact with a more comprehensive inner dimension. Gradually, we can align our actions with our decisions while reaching a state of balance and "loosening" of any mental automatism. Even a 10% reduction in useless thoughts can cause us to live better and more present in reality.
